text: DXAQ-TV, channel 43, is a flagship television station of Philippine religious television network Sonshine Media Network International (SMNI). Its studios are located at the Kingdom of Jesus Christ compound, Philippine-Japan Friendship Highway, Sasa, Davao City and transmitter are located at Shrine Hills, Matina, Davao City. DXAQ-TV now broadcasts on 24-hour-a-day, all-year- round non-stop operation. ==Digital television== ===Digital channels=== UHF Channel 19 (503.143 MHz) {| class="wikitable" ! Channel ! Video ! Aspect ! PSIP Short Name ! Programming ! title: DXAQ-TV
